caption.p: Antioxidant capacities of Ricinus communis L. extracts. (A) Ferric reducing antioxidant power (B) Reducing power (C) DPPH scavenging capacity (D) Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity (E) Inhibition of liposome oxidation. Values represent the meanÂ±SD. Each value represents the mean of three replicates.
